body: Hm. Looks like the test is still failing, but now on another portion of the same file. Not totally sure what the issue is here, @mythmon any thoughts? The issue stems from the differences in `foobar.svg` and `identicon.svg`, though I've applied changes to both files, so I'm not sure if there is a third missing file I need to update or what.
